00015 #include "subprocess.h"
00016 
00017 #include "test.h"
00018 
00019 namespace {
00020 
00021 #ifdef _WIN32
00022 const char* kSimpleCommand = "dir \\";
00023 #else
00024 const char* kSimpleCommand = "ls /";
00025 #endif
00026 
00027 struct SubprocessTest : public testing::Test {
00028   SubprocessSet subprocs_;
00029 };
00030 
00031 }  // anonymous namespace
00032 
00033 // Run a command that succeeds and emits to stdout.
00034 TEST_F(SubprocessTest, GoodCommandStdout) {
00035   Subprocess ls;
00036   EXPECT_TRUE(ls.Start(&subprocs_, kSimpleCommand));
00037 
00038   while (!ls.Done()) {
00039     // Pretend we discovered that stdout was ready for writing.
00040     ls.OnPipeReady();
00041   }
00042 
00043   EXPECT_TRUE(ls.Finish());
00044   EXPECT_NE("", ls.GetOutput());
00045 }
00046 
00047 // Run a command that fails and emits to stderr.
00048 TEST_F(SubprocessTest, BadCommandStderr) {
00049   Subprocess subproc;
00050   EXPECT_TRUE(subproc.Start(&subprocs_, "ninja_no_such_command"));
00051 
00052   while (!subproc.Done()) {
00053     // Pretend we discovered that stderr was ready for writing.
00054     subproc.OnPipeReady();
00055   }
00056 
00057   EXPECT_FALSE(subproc.Finish());
00058   EXPECT_NE("", subproc.GetOutput());
00059 }
00060 
00061 TEST_F(SubprocessTest, SetWithSingle) {
00062   Subprocess* subproc = new Subprocess;
00063   EXPECT_TRUE(subproc->Start(&subprocs_, kSimpleCommand));
00064   subprocs_.Add(subproc);
00065 
00066   while (!subproc->Done()) {
00067     subprocs_.DoWork();
00068   }
00069   ASSERT_TRUE(subproc->Finish());
00070   ASSERT_NE("", subproc->GetOutput());
00071 
00072   ASSERT_EQ(1u, subprocs_.finished_.size());
00073 }
00074 
00075 TEST_F(SubprocessTest, SetWithMulti) {
00076   Subprocess* processes[3];
00077   const char* kCommands[3] = {
00078     kSimpleCommand,
00079 #ifdef _WIN32
00080     "echo hi",
00081     "time /t",
00082 #else
00083     "whoami",
00084     "pwd",
00085 #endif
00086   };
00087 
00088   for (int i = 0; i < 3; ++i) {
00089     processes[i] = new Subprocess;
00090     EXPECT_TRUE(processes[i]->Start(&subprocs_, kCommands[i]));
00091     subprocs_.Add(processes[i]);
00092   }
00093 
00094   ASSERT_EQ(3u, subprocs_.running_.size());
00095   for (int i = 0; i < 3; ++i) {
00096     ASSERT_FALSE(processes[i]->Done());
00097     ASSERT_EQ("", processes[i]->GetOutput());
00098   }
00099 
00100   while (!processes[0]->Done() || !processes[1]->Done() ||
00101          !processes[2]->Done()) {
00102     ASSERT_GT(subprocs_.running_.size(), 0u);
00103     subprocs_.DoWork();
00104   }
00105 
00106   ASSERT_EQ(0u, subprocs_.running_.size());
00107   ASSERT_EQ(3u, subprocs_.finished_.size());
00108 
00109   for (int i = 0; i < 3; ++i) {
00110     ASSERT_TRUE(processes[i]->Finish());
00111     ASSERT_NE("", processes[i]->GetOutput());
00112     delete processes[i];
00113   }
00114 }
